Articles.Content:
Hey! I hope I'm eligible for the badge even though I'm a new forum member? The challenges brought me here, and as this is a "quick one" (excluding the hours it takes to practice flying a wickedly fast plane so low), I decided to start off with it. =)

**Stock installation (v 1.0.2).** I used two each, turbojets, airbrakes and drogue chutes, to maximise the full-throttle-window without overshooting the runway.

**Time: 1:13**

It was really nerve-wracking to manage the altitude, even with fine-control activated, because sooner or later height-corrections started to be more and more violent ... but too little or late and Valentina either overshot the height limit or started hydrobraking abruptly. Finally, after a rough but quick and non-lethal ride, she arrived at the island's airport with a surprisingly smooth touchdown. 

![O8vISYI.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/O8vISYI.jpg)

![v6FUqP3.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/v6FUqP3.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T07:46:14Z" title="05/04/2015 07:46  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by U474U**

Hey U474U, welcome to the forum ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) If you want to embed images, use either the "Insert Image" function or add the direct link to the image inside (img)(/img) tags (just switch () for [])

> 
> ![931F28FD4D96C30A73CE836F03F58C70DF6CF227](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32992612670233794/931F28FD4D96C30A73CE836F03F58C70DF6CF227/)
> 
> ![705AA66499CAAF15EFDBC116C2258EB3A8BE4AA0](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32992612670232857/705AA66499CAAF15EFDBC116C2258EB3A8BE4AA0/)

The url tags can be used for text, [like](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32992612670233794/931F28FD4D96C30A73CE836F03F58C70DF6CF227/) [this](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/32992612670232857/705AA66499CAAF15EFDBC116C2258EB3A8BE4AA0/).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-04T10:29:32Z" title="05/04/2015 10:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 4, 2015</time> by Deutherius**
  
spoilered the images to take less space
Thanks, the forum was down right after I noticed the broken links. Fixed it now. =)

This was harder as it sounded, screwed up first time not knowing the island runway was so high up !

But I did it, not fast or anything:

Alt:147

Time: 06.03

4.36 fuel used.

![pHTtII4.png](http://i.imgur.com/pHTtII4.png)

![C8BE4dQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/C8BE4dQ.png)

![57U8kUr.png](http://i.imgur.com/57U8kUr.png)

![rkk4cdi.png](http://i.imgur.com/rkk4cdi.png)

Maybe I will try this again and go a bit faster...

Edit, to bad, thread is closed:(

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-17T19:20:37Z" title="06/17/2015 07:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 17, 2015</time> by Triop**

**Wow! This challenge was a lot harder than I thought it would be!**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AB8WGFF9jXk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Nothing record breaking here, but I'm satisfied to have finally completed the challenge after 20+ attempts.

**Challenge stats:**

Time: 2:19

Max Alt: 139 m

Max Speed: 331 m/s
